text: FADE IN: INT. OLD VICTORIAN HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - NIGHT Approx. Timestamp: 00:00:00 Rain lashes the windows. EMMA 32, tired single mom sits on a worn couch, scrolling her phone. Her daughter LILY 8 sleeps upstairs. The house creaksold pipes, settling wood. EMMA soft, to herself Just one more bill paid... then bed. A faint WHISPER from the wall behind her. Indistinct. She freezes. EMMA Hello? Silence. She shakes it off, stands, walks to the kitchen. CUT TO: INT. KITCHEN - CONTINUOUS Approx. Timestamp: 00:01:30 Emma pours water. The whisper againcloser, like breath on her neck. WHISPER O.S. ...stay... Emma spins. Nothing. She laughs nervously. EMMA Old house. Just the wind. She heads upstairs. INT. UPSTAIRS HALLWAY - NIGHT

Approx. Timestamp: 00:03:00 Emma checks on Lily. The girl is peaceful, clutching a stuffed bear. Emma kisses her forehead. EMMA whispering Sweet dreams, baby. As she turns to leave, the bedroom door creaks shut behind herslowly, on its own. Emma stops. EMMA Lily? No answer. She pushes the door open. Lily is gone. Bed empty. EMMA panicked Lily! She rushes downstairs. INT. LIVING ROOM - NIGHT Approx. Timestamp: 00:05:00 Emma searches frantically. Calls out. EMMA Lily! This isn't funny! The whispers growmultiple voices now, overlapping, childlike but wrong. WHISPERS O.S. ...she's ours now... she likes it here... Emma grabs her phone no signal. She runs to the front door. Locked. She twists the knob violently. EMMA Open! Come on! The

lights flicker. Shadows stretch unnaturally long across the walls. CUT TO: INT. BASEMENT STAIRS - NIGHT Approx. Timestamp: 00:07:30 Emma, flashlight in hand, descends slowly. The whispers lead her down. WHISPERS ...down here... she's waiting... At the bottom: the basement is empty except for an old mirror covered in dust. Emma approaches. She wipes the glass. Her reflection stares backbut it's not moving with her. The reflection smiles. REFLECTION EMMA soft, eerie You've been gone so long, Emma. We missed you. Emma backs away. The mirror cracksslow spiderweb fractures. Suddenly, LILY'S VOICE from behind the mirror. LILY O.S. Mommy... help... Emma smashes the mirror with her elbow. Glass shatters. Darkness swallows the room. The whispers become screamsinhuman. EMMA screaming Give
her back! Blackout. Only the sound of rain... and one last whisper. WHISPER O.S. ...she's home now... FADE OUT.
